TopicTitle: Hi every one and every kerbonaut

Articles.Content:
This thread or post is for people who are new and can know eachother so time to introduce yourselves!!!

also my name is mirai the kerbonaut i wonder if squad can name a kerbal (Mirai Kerman)

Hi there! I'm a new to the forums Kerbonaut as well and I thought I'd introduce myself. I've got some experience going to different planetary bodies and building space stations and whatnot, but there are still many things which I have not yet mastered or even attempted.

Really looking forward to experimenting with the new release!
